result.title: A set of BIM Passports of the existing building stock
result.description: This deliverable presents: the guidelines to establish BIM Passports of the existing building stock as well as the preliminary set of BIM Passports based on the real demonstration cases in BIM-SPEED and the contributions from the EU BIM for Renovation Competition (in collaboration with WP8); and the storage of the BIM Passports either on BIM-SPEED Platform (WP6) or a common repository at EU level (availability and accessibility to be investigated).

result.title: Final technical report from target vessel testing
result.description: A report containing details of the fuel cell system test runs including the refilling of the hydrogen storage at HRS end user experiences of the operation of the fuel cell system in vessel and details of the vessel energy consumption during the fuel cell test runsThe report contains also details of the fuel cell system performance including the details of the reliability operation of particle filters and particle detectors
